attributes.action: Force South Somerset Council to build a new bypass around Yeovil.
attributes.background:
South Somerset council has tried to make road improvements on the cheap by way of altering one of the major roundabouts in Yeovil.
This has caused a reduced flow of traffic thus causing more chaos at all times of the day.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of Somerset Council, not of the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition about this issue with Somerset Council using the link bellow: 

http://www.somerset.gov.uk/have-your-say/petitions/
